data.message: Dear Facebook, whenever i click to watch a video, the video take half of my screen, and comments takes half.. I know its good.. But the half for comments is just too small, i can only see maybe 1 comment.. And i will have keep scrolling scrolling.. Its annoying. Wait until i am replying a comment.. Thats where the frustration intensifies, i can only see my keyboard and cant see what i am actually typing. Please correct it thx. Dont say that my screen is small, its not

replies.message: Hi Chris! We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience. Let us know what we can do to improve yours: http://bit.ly/2y5NjxI. Thanks! -Caitlin

Facebook Yeah Get the crap off the FB when i am trying to type something and comment comes up from another person. over top it all. this is a new stupid idea you people come up with. Get it off NOW!!!!!
Hi Chris .Can you please help promote my Facebook page
